content: KCM-MD Kwik Cast cast-in-place anchor, long plate Ultimate-performance multi-thread long plate cast-in-place anchor for concrete on metal deck with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Application-relevant multi-thread configurations Pre-assembled self-tapping screws reduce installation time Pre-assembled spanner plate offers flexibility with installation at any location on the metal deck Color-coded plastic plugs protect inner threads from concrete and Monokote® fireproofing KCM-MD Combo Bit, 2-in-1 setting tool, available for quick and easy installation Applications Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements Pre-installed fastening points for seismic bracing applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight over metal deck), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck), Concrete (uncracked) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | IBC compliance | IBC 2012, IBC 2015, IBC 2018, IBC 2021 | Material composition | Carbon steel, Zinc-plated | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 2363082 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD L 1/4,3/8,1/2 BLK-BLU - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-MDL 1/4|3/8|1/2 BLK-BLU Cast-in anchor assy - 2267028 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD L 1/4,3/8 GRN-GRN - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-MD L (S G) Cast-in anchor assy - 3676223 - KCM-MD L GREEN-G PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 675x KCM-MD L (S G) Cast-in anchor assy - 2221704 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD L 3/8,1/2 ORG-ORG - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-MD L (M O) Cast-in anchor assy - 3614656 - KCM-MD L ORANGE-O PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 540x KCM-MD L (M O) Cast-in anchor assy - 2267027 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD L 3/8,1/2,5/8 RED-RED - Package Size 15 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-MD L (St R) Cast-in anchor assy - 3676224 - KCM-MD L RED-R PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 405x KCM-MD L (St R) Cast-in anchor assy - 2221705 - Kwik Cast KCM-MD L 5/8,3/4 GRY-ORG - Package Size 15 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCM-MD L (L) Cast-in anchor assy - 3676162 - KCM-MD L GREY-B PALLET+2KCM-MD-CB - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x Combo Bit KCM-MD-CB 3/16-1 1/8 - 405x KCM-MD L (L) Cast-in anchor assy - 3614657 - KCM-MD L GREY-B PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 405x KCM-MD L (L) Cast-in anchor assy
